meta.description: Optimize the flow of renewable energy from Substation 0 to Substation 7 in a futuristic network.

sets.name: NODES
sets.description: Substations in the energy distribution network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum energy flow capacity between substations in megawatts.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Energy flow between substations in megawatts.

objective.name: max_energy_flow
objective.description: Maximize the energy flow from Substation 0 to Substation 7.
